summary_text: After an extramarital indiscretion, a fairy-tale Prince and his sidekick are turned into frogs for all eternity, or until the Prince can convince a maiden to kiss, and then marry him.

name: Santa & Cie
summary_text: When all the elves get sick, Santa must find a cure on Earth to save Christmas.

summary_text: A jaded psychotherapist returns to her first passion of becoming a writer.
